CustomField.description: Open the Single Touch Payroll lodgement in the Single Touch Payroll Manager page
CustomField.formula:
If ( RecordType.DeveloperName = "Single_Touch_Payroll" , HYPERLINK("/one/one.app#/alohaRedirect/apex/tc9_eau__SingleTouchPayroll?recordId="+ tc9_eau__Lodgement_AU__r.Id , IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+
If( CONTAINS ( Text ( tc9_eau__Lodgement_AU__r.tc9_eau__Status__c ) , "Failed" ) || CONTAINS ( Text ( tc9_eau__Lodgement_AU__r.tc9_eau__Status__c ) , "Rejected" ) || CONTAINS ( Text ( tc9_eau__Lodgement_AU__r.tc9_eau__Status__c ) , "Error" ) || CONTAINS ( Text ( tc9_eau__Lodgement_AU__r.tc9_eau__Status__c ) , "Cancelled" ), "resource/tc9_pr__Payroll_resources/AUS_Payroll/Images/LaunchButton_Red.png",
If( CONTAINS ( Text ( tc9_eau__Lodgement_AU__r.tc9_eau__Status__c ) , "New" ) , "resource/tc9_pr__Payroll_resources/AUS_Payroll/Images/LaunchButton_Orange.png",
If( CONTAINS ( Text ( tc9_eau__Lodgement_AU__r.tc9_eau__Status__c ) , "ing" ) , "resource/tc9_pr__Payroll_resources/AUS_Payroll/Images/LaunchButton_Green.png",
"resource/tc9_pr__Payroll_resources/AUS_Payroll/Images/LaunchButton_Blue.png" ) ) ) ,"Manager"),"_blank") , "" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Open the Single Touch Payroll lodgement in the Single Touch Payroll Manager page
CustomField.label: Lodgement Manager
